# The `ARCOptAddrMode.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass folds LD/ST + ADD pairs into Pre/Post-increment form of load/store instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass folds LD/ST + ADD pairs into Pre/Post-increment form of load/store instructions.
